product_name: The North Face Denali Down Jacket - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Denali Down jacket keeps girls stylish, comfortable and active in a winter wonderland, with heavyweight Polartec(R) fleece and lofty goose down insulation at the shoulders and chest. Breathable Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece warms even when wet and dries quickly. Insulated at the shoulders and chest with a lofty, 550-fill-power goose down insulation for additional thermal warmth in the cold. Durable, abrasion-resistant 2-ply nylon fabric aids with wear and tear while carrying a pack. Elastic-bound cuffs and drawcord hem. 2 zip-secure hand pockets. Zip-in integration feature lets you zip the Denali Down jacket into compatible shells and parkas from The North Face. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Denali Down jacket keeps girls stylish, comfortable and active in a winter wonderland, with heavyweight Polartec(R) fleece and lofty goose down insulation at the shoulders and chest.
